resources.string: We need your location to find people near you.

Welcome to Qimates!

We\'re super excited to have you here!

Let’s get started by selecting your sex.

I am a Female, Male, or Person.
Edit your <tap data="edit">profile</tap>, or <tap data="qi">氣 prefs</tap>
Show me <tap data="who">%1$s</tap> in <tap data="where">%2$s</tap> between the ages of <tap data="ageMin">%3$s</tap> and <tap data="ageMax">%4$s</tap>
Not in Austin? Don\'t worry, keep Qimates installed and we\'ll let you know when we launch in more areas. <tap data="ok">Okay then</tap>.

Choose a photo. We review all photos for authenticity and naturalness. We recommend hiring a pro photographer.

We allow nudity so long as it is artistic or cute. Read our Photography Guidebook.

Choose a photo, or Close

Choose a photo, or reposition this one.

We review all photos for authenticity and naturalness. We recommend hiring a pro photographer.

We allow nudity so long as it is artistic or cute. Read our Photography Guidebook.

Choose a photo, or Close
Hide %1$s and report as <tap data="report:confirm:fake">Fake</tap> or <tap data="report:confirm:other">Something else</tap>

Your account will die and you\'ll need to be invited again to join.

Do you want this?

Yes, delete my account

No way, get me outta here
Yes, <tap data="love">I want to be qimates with %1$s</tap>
Tap here to tell people more about you

Photography Guidebook

1.   You should be the highlight of the photograph.
2.   Use a pro camera and an interesting location.
3.   Be artistic! Pose in a new way. Express yourself fully.
4.   Your photo should appear natural (some color correction and post editing is cool.)

Close Guidebook
<tap data="profile">Complete your profile</tap> to let %1$s discover you
Your profile is currently in review
You want to be qimates with %1$s. <tap data="love:remove">Remove</tap>
You and %1$s want to be qimates. <tap data="message">Talk with %2$s</tap>
Your profile is complete. <tap data="submit">Submit for review</tap>
Tap to show you want to be qimates with %1$s. If %2$s also wants to be qimates with you, you’ll both be able to talk with each other.

Hey friend!

Qimates is an app for Austinites to get closer to and learn about each other.

Start by scanning someone\'s invite code
write something here to complement your photo
Scan someone\'s invite code to join Qimates.
